evidence.claim: The company uses AWS services including Lambda and S3 for their tech stack.
CaseCTRL ensures HIPAA compliance for handling sensitive health data.
The system integrates with EHRs using FHIR standards for patient data exchange.
They implement integration patterns using REST APIs to connect with external systems.
The use of X12 standards for healthcare transactions is referenced in their technology overview.

icp.icp_reason: CaseCTRL's focus on HIPAA compliance and X12 transactions aligns with ICP criteria.
